info.title: SentraIP MCP Adapter
info.description: FastAPI microservice that acts as an MCP adapter for the SentraIP Threat Intelligence API. Provides /mcp/check_ip, /mcp/asn, and /mcp/stats endpoints.

get.description:
Check reputation and threat information for an IP address.
Example: /mcp/check_ip?ip=1.1.1.1

parameters.name: ip

schema.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address to check
schema.title: Ip

parameters.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address to check

get.description:
Retrieve general statistics or usage metrics from SentraIP.
Example: /mcp/stats
